page.title: 16RECREATION IN DUMFRIES(cont)
page.content:
{LEISURE FACILITIES IN DUMFRIES The majority of elderly people wanted a bowling rink and the younger people wanted a new sports centre.Certain complaints about the cost of a round of golf at the county golf club showed that cheaper facilities would help busines in Dumfries.
